examples.example: 我认真地阅读这一册有趣的书籍，从中收获了很多知识和快乐。

translate.english: I seriously read this interesting volume of books and gained a lot of knowledge and happiness from it.

examples.example: 我小心翼翼地翻开这一册珍贵的相册，回忆起了许多美好的往事。

translate.english: I carefully opened this precious album and recalled many wonderful past events.

examples.example: 我开心地拿起这一册精美的画册，欣赏着里面绚丽的画面。

translate.english: I happily picked up this exquisite album and enjoyed the gorgeous pictures inside.
